com.aql.message.mt
Class MTMessage

java.lang.Object
  com.aql.message.mt.MTMessage
Direct Known Subclasses:
MTMmsMessage, MTSmsMessage
public abstract class MTMessage
extends java.lang.Object

Respresents the common compenents of a Mobile Terminated, (MT), message sent through one of the Aql outbound APIs. This class may be extended to represent any MT message such as SMS, MMS.

All MT messages, what ever the implementation require an array of destination phone numbers, an originator and a Callback object if status updates are required

setCallbackUrl

public void setCallbackUrl(java.lang.String callbackUrl)
This method is called by the AqlMTSmsSoapClient at send time and there is no need for developers to call this method in their own implementations Developers should set the callback url in the AqlMTSmsSoapClient rather than call here for every message they create.

Parameters:
callbackUrl -
